categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Kyle Katarn was a Force-sensitive human male who worked as a mercenary and an operative for the Rebel Alliance and became known as a thorn in the Galactic Empire's side. Eventually, Katarn went on to become a Jedi. For equipment, he used a green lightsaber and a K-16 Bryar Pistol.

Kyle Katarn was first detailed in the current Star Wars canon on a card illustrated by Jarreau Wimberly as part of the Galactic Ambitions expansion pack released in 2016 for Fantasy Flight Games's Star Wars: The Card Game.

The character was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity as the playable character of Star Wars: Dark Forces, a first-person shooter video game developed by LucasArts and released in 1995.

In Dark Forces, Katarn operates the HWK-290 light freighter Moldy Crow and investigates the Tak Base on Talay that was assaulted by dark troopers; eventually Katarn causes the termination of the Dark Trooper Project. These elements were introduced in the new canon, but not associated with Katarn.[source?]
